title: Bloomberg Markets: Craig Johnson's Holiday Retail Forecast
itunes:title: Bloomberg Markets: Craig Johnson's Holiday Retail Forecast
description:
Bloomberg Markets with Carol Massar and Cory Johnson.\u0010\u0010GUEST:\u0010Craig Johnson\u0010President\u0010Customer Growth Partners\u0010Discussing his 2017 Christmas retail forecast and seeing consensus growth of 4.3%, and potentially much higher, paced by home-related categories and e-Commerce.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
